items: Ferric Chloride 40% is a versatile industrial chemical used in water treatment, metal pickling, and PCB manufacturing. Offering high purity and consistent perfo

*Ferric Chloride 40%* is a versatile industrial chemical with a wide range of applications. As a concentrated solution of ferric chloride, this product offers high purity and reliable performance. With a specific gravity of 1.43, it is an effective coagulant, oxidizer, and etchant in various industries. *Key Properties:* High purity, concentrated formula, consistent specific gravity. *Common Uses:* Water treatment, metal pickling, printed circuit board (PCB) manufacturing, and more. *Safety:* Handle with care, use appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE), and follow all safety guidelines. *Benefits:* Highly effective, cost-efficient solution for a variety of industrial processes.

modules.note: Always follow the SDS and label directions. Use appropriate PPE.

- *Ferric Chloride 40%* is a versatile industrial chemical with a wide range of applications. As a concentrated solution of ferric chloride, this product offers high purity and reliable performance. With a specific gravity of 1.43, it is an effective coagulant, oxidizer, and etchant in various industries. *Key Properties:* High purity, concentrated formula, consistent specific gravity. *Common Uses:* Water treatment, metal pickling, printed circuit board (PCB) manufacturing, and more. *Safety:* Handle with care, use appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE), and follow all safety guidelines. *Benefits:* Highly effective, cost-efficient solution for a variety of industrial processes.

## Common Applications
Industrial, Environmental, Wastewater.

## Safety & Handling
Always follow the SDS and label directions.

## Images Needed (Suggestions)
- Front label / hero image
- Spec callouts (purity/concentration/CAS if applicable)
- Application collage (uses without regulated efficacy claims)

description:
Ferric Chloride 40%

Ferric Chloride 40% • CAS 7705-08-0

Size: 1 Gallon

Specifications:
- Formula: FeCl3
- Molecular weight: 162.21
- Appearance: Dark brown liquid, metallic luster, fuming
- Solubility: Highly water soluble, compatible with alcohols
- Specific gravity: 1.43
- Boiling point: 280
- Melting point: 37

Common applications: Industrial, Environmental, Wastewater.

Documentation: SDS available.

Safety: Use appropriate PPE and follow the SDS and label directions.
title: Alliance Chemical Ferric Chloride 40% 1 Gallon
